p: Total RNA was extracted from homogenized lungs or cultured cells using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen) based on the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. RNA was quantified and cDNA was synthesized using a reverse transcriptase kit (Tiangen, Beijing, China), followed by quantitative real-time polymerase chain reaction (RT-qPCR) analysis (SYBR Green, Selleck).
